sqlProfile.name: production-profile
sqlProfile.retrieveSql: select last_run as start, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as end from changeset_profile where name = :name
sqlProfile.updateSql: update changeset_profile set last_run = :lastRun where name = :name

set-item.query: SELECT mid.id, name, value FROM my_items JOIN my_items_data mid on (id) ORDER BY mid.id, name
set-item.subquery: select name as color from SubqueryColors where parent_id=:id order by name

set-item.query: SELECT mid.id, name, value FROM my_items JOIN my_items_data mid on (id) ORDER BY mid.id, name WHERE timestamp >= :start and timestamp < :end
set-item.subquery: select name as color from SubqueryColors where parent_id=:id order by name

remove-item.query: select id from deleted_items where last_updated >= :start and last_updated < :end
